detail_desc: Jacket in a cotton-blend weave with a hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip down the front, handwarmer pockets and flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud. Elasticated drawstring waist and adjustable tabs with press-studs a the cuffs. Unlined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a lightly brushed finish. Lined, padded, drawstring hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped handwarmer pockets, large patch pockets at the front, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem.
Lightly padded sleeping bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with press-studs at the top and a jersey lining. Polyester padding. The sleeping bag is designed for indoor use.
